fetch.command: svn export -r 8911 svn://projects.linuxtogo.org/svn/gpe/trunk/base/libgpewidget libgpewidget-0svn wget "http://skaboy.no-ip.org/~luogni/mud/libgpewidget-debian.patch" -O libgpewidget-0svn/libgpewidget-debian.patch patch -d libgpewidget-0svn -p0 < ./libgpewidget-0svn/libgpewidget-debian.patch
